snippet: Mary Jo White would face significant challenges as leader of the S.E.C. | Hostess Brands struck a $410 million deal to save Twinkies and Ding Dongs. | A corporate spinoff can present a tempting opportunity to offload liabilities. | The Carlyle Group...
abstract: Mary Jo White would face significant challenges as leader of the S.E.C. | Hostess Brands struck a $410 million deal to save Twinkies and Ding Dongs. | A corporate spinoff can present a tempting opportunity to offload liabilities. | The Carlyle Group is lowering the bar for investors to participate in its private equity buyouts.
